data.lore: The mysteries that surround Rammus are numerous. How did a simple creature of the desert suddenly become able to reason? How did he craft his vaunted suit of armor? What is he searching for as he crosses the Shuriman desert? One thing is for certain: trying to stop the inexorable Rammus is a fool's mission.
data.name: Rammus
data.title: the Armordillo

spells.tooltip:
Rammus accelerates in a ball over {{ e4 }} seconds towards his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies on impact, knocking them back, and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Activating Defensive Ball Curl will remove this effect after 1 second.
spells.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Rammus accelerates in a ball over {{ e4 }} seconds towards his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies on impact, knocking them back, and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. Activating Defensive Ball Curl will remove this effect after 1 second.
spells.name: Powerball
spells.sanitizedDescription: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.

spells.tooltip:
Rammus goes into a defensive formation for {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} and returning {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to attackers.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e4 }}% of Armor.

Activating Powerball will remove this effect after 1 second.
spells.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resist, while returning damage to attacks.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Rammus goes into a defensive formation for {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e1 }} and returning {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to attackers. This ability gains damage equal to {{ e4 }}% of Armor. Activating Powerball will remove this effect after 1 second.
spells.name: Defensive Ball Curl
spells.sanitizedDescription: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resist, while returning damage to attacks.

spells.tooltip: Rammus taunts the enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault, reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} and forcing them to attack Rammus for {{ e1 }} second(s).
spells.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against Rammus' hard shell, reducing Armor temporarily.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Rammus taunts the enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault, reducing their Armor by {{ e2 }} and forcing them to attack Rammus for {{ e1 }} second(s).
spells.name: Puncturing Taunt
spells.sanitizedDescription: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against Rammus' hard shell, reducing Armor temporarily.

spells.tooltip: Rammus creates tremors beneath him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every second to nearby units and structures for {{ e3 }} seconds.
spells.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to units and structures near him.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Rammus creates tremors beneath him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage every second to nearby units and structures for {{ e3 }} seconds.
spells.name: Tremors
spells.sanitizedDescription: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to units and structures near him.

passive.name: Spiked Shell
passive.description: Rammus gains additional damage as his shell becomes reinforced, converting 25% of his Armor into Attack Damage.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Rammus gains additional damage as his shell becomes reinforced, converting 25% of his Armor into Attack Damage.
